Package org.jcatapult.persistence.service.jpa

Interface Summary
JPAService This interface is used to configure, start and handle JPA interactions.
 

Class Summary
DefaultJPAService This class implements the JPA service.
EntityManagerContext This class is a context container for the EntityManager that is setup in the filter.
EntityManagerProvider This class is a Guice provider that provider access to the EntityManagerContext thread local holder for JPA EntityManager.
EntityManagerProxy This class is a proxy that allows an EntityManager to be injected into services but lazily initialized from the EntityManagerContext.
JPAPersistenceService This class is the default implementation of the PersistenceService and provides default JPA behavior.
